---
category: news
title: "Watch artificial intelligence grow a walking caterpillar in Minecraft"
excerpt: "But it’s not a human constructing these castles, trees, and caterpillars—it’s artificial intelligence. The algorithm takes its cue from the “Game of Life,” a so-called cellular automaton. There, squares in a grid turn black or white over a series of timesteps based on how many of their neighbors are black or white."
